title: Customer Service Executive - WFO
description:
Freshers & Experienced both can apply! Earn up to ₹25,000 CTC. Easy Interview Process. Immediate Joining!

About the Role:
Handle & resolve customer queries over calls.
- Male Candidates: Rotational 24*7 shifts.
- Female Candidates: Day shift only.
qualification: 12th Pass / Graduate / Undergraduate - All can apply
application_instructions:
1. Click the link to fill the form.
2. Mention HR POOJA as the source.
3. Provide details of three friends as references.
4. A token number will be generated – share it with HR Twinkle.
interview_location: iEnergizer, Gate No. 2, A-37, Sector 60, Noida

title: Customer Service Executive - WFO
description: Handle customer queries via voice, email, or chat with professionalism and empathy. Provide accurate information and resolve customer issues in a timely manner. Maintain high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent service. Follow company protocols and procedures. Escalate complex issues to higher-level support if required.

requirements.communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
requirements.shifts: Willingness to work in rotational shifts, including night shifts

title: Customer Service Executive - WFO

experience: 0.5+ years (Freshers who are Graduates also eligible)
shift: UK Shifts with 2 rotational offs (Night shift readiness required)
